summary: This document is a Certificate of Authenticity from AT&T, attesting to the accuracy and integrity of certain records related to the Epstein case. Nicholas DeRoy, a Legal Compliance Analyst at AT&T, certifies that the attached records are true duplicates of the originals and were created and maintained in accordance with standard business practices.

persons.name: Nicholas DeRoy
persons.context: Nicholas DeRoy certifies the authenticity of records related to the Epstein case, affirming their accuracy and proper handling by AT&T.

locations: 11760 US HWY 1, SUITE 300 NORTH PALM BEACH FL 33408
keyFacts: Nicholas DeRoy is employed by AT&T as a Legal Compliance Analyst.
The document certifies that the attached records are true duplicates of original records in AT&T's custody.
The certification is intended to satisfy Federal Rules of Evidence 902(11) and 902(13).
The records were created and maintained in the ordinary course of AT&T's business activities.
